text:
Ah, um... I'm thinking about what to say for the MC...
and reviewing the formations...

No, I just feel anxious if I'm not doing something...
to make sure I don't blank out on stage.

...Yeah, I get it. But as long as you have
your usual gentle smile, you'll be fine.

I even felt like giving you my business card
when I saw that smile.

─Well then, to maintain that usual smile,
you need to relax, right?

If Producer-san is by my side, I can do it...
...Oh, maybe you could come up on stage with me...!
